prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Drums, Bass, and a Synth Lead, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This composition has no Organ, but does include Drums, Bass, Piano, and a Synth Lead.

Style 3:
No Organ is present in this song, but it does have Drums, Bass, Piano, and a Synth Lead.
